frontmatter.title: From Strategy Games to AI-Driven QR Codes: A Journey Through My Diverse Software Creations
frontmatter.summary: In this post, I introduce three of my software projects: “Greedy Kings,” a strategy-driven offline iOS game; “Talkie,” a React app that turns text into speech; and “Magic QR,” an iOS app that generates AI-powered QR codes embedded within images. Each project showcases different ways I’ve used coding to create engaging experiences and practical solutions.
